title: 'Lady Al-Qaida' And The Business Of Prisoner Swaps
teaser: Arun Rath talks to journalist Shane Harris about his Foreign Policy story on "Lady al-Qaida," Aafia Siddiqui. The Pakistani-born woman was arrested in Afghanistan in 2008.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
